title: Redeploy the current application build

requirements.text: Redeploy the application using the current codebase (no feature changes), and ensure the deployment completes successfully.
acceptanceCriteria: A new deployment is triggered using the current repository state.
If deployment fails again, provide the full deployment error output/logs so the failure can be diagnosed in a follow-up change request.

constraints: Do not change application behavior, UI, or backend logic as part of this redeploy request.
nonGoals: Changing canister state, schemas, or performing migrations.
